This is a straightforward creation task with known steps, so use complexity="basic" when beginning.

     2‚Üíimport * as React from "react"
     3‚Üíimport { Slot } from "@radix-ui/react-slot"
     4‚Üíimport { cva, type VariantProps } from "class-variance-authority"
     5‚Üíimport { cn } from "@/lib/utils"
     6‚Üíconst buttonVariants = cva(
     7‚Üí  "inline-flex items-center justify-center whitespace-nowrap rounded-md text-sm font-medium ring-offset-background transition-colors focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50",
     8‚Üí  {
     9‚Üí    variants: {
    10‚Üí      variant: {
    11‚Üí        default: "bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90",
    12‚Üí        destructive:
    13‚Üí          "bg-destructive text-destructive-foreground hover:bg-destructive/90",
    14‚Üí        outline:
    15‚Üí          "border border-input bg-background hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground",
    16‚Üí        secondary:
    17‚Üí          "bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80",
    18‚Üí        ghost: "hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground",
    19‚Üí        link: "text-primary underline-offset-4 hover:underline",
    20‚Üí      },
    21‚Üí      size: {
    22‚Üí        default: "h-10 px-4 py-2",
    23‚Üí        sm: "h-9 rounded-md px-3",
    24‚Üí        lg: "h-11 rounded-md px-8",
    25‚Üí        icon: "h-10 w-10",
    26‚Üí      },
    27‚Üí    },
    28‚Üí    defaultVariants: {
    29‚Üí      variant: "default",
    30‚Üí      size: "default",
    31‚Üí    },
    32‚Üí  }
    33‚Üí)
    34‚Üíexport interface ButtonProps
    35‚Üí  extends React.ButtonHTMLAttributes<HTMLButtonElement>,
    36‚Üí    VariantProps<typeof buttonVariants> {
    37‚Üí  asChild?: boolean
    38‚Üí}
    39‚Üíconst Button = React.forwardRef<HTMLButtonElement, ButtonProps>(
    40‚Üí  ({ className, variant, size, asChild = false, ...props }, ref) => {
    41‚Üí    const Comp = asChild ? Slot : "button"
    42‚Üí    return (
    43‚Üí      <Comp
    44‚Üí        className={cn(buttonVariants({ variant, size, className }))}
    45‚Üí        ref={ref}
    46‚Üí        {...props}
    47‚Üí      />
    48‚Üí    )
    49‚Üí  }
    50‚Üí)
    51‚ÜíButton.displayName = "Button"
    52‚Üíexport { Button, buttonVariants }
    53‚Üí
